locutie.beschrijving: The sermon addresses the tension between nationalistic 'American way of life' and the 'Christian way of life' through the lens of Paul's doxology in Romans 11. It explores the justification of the ungodly and God's universal purpose.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Strong. Connects Paul's thought to Second Isaiah and the context of Romans 9-11, focusing on the radical nature of grace.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher primarily asserts theological truths and invites the congregation into a shared vision of God's sovereignty, with occasional directives to 'stand in awe'.
voorbeelden: This proclamation of the justification of the ungodly knocks all the props out from under 'religion'.
Paul invites us to join him in God’s way of life.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Humility, repentance of nationalism, and a shift from self-righteousness to awe-filled trust in God's providence.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The Spirit is not explicitly named as the agent of the word's effect, though the 'ecstatic vision' of Paul is mentioned.

voorbeelden: Paul has been agonizing about the fact...
There is no way to exaggerate the radical nature...
God does pick groups of people for special purposes.
Do not be proud, but stand in awe.
Let us turn away from the international stage.
Take a good look at ourselves.
We sinners who know ourselves only too well are tempted to smile.
God's purpose for salvation will encompass all the nations.
God makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Moderate. Promises are often framed as descriptions of God's character rather than direct 'I promise you' addresses.

voorbeelden: There are no foreigners among us; none at all.
To him be glory for ever.
declaratieven.autoriteit: High in the specific moment of declaring 'no foreigners', but generally descriptive.

indicatoren: Third-person descriptions of Paul's dictation process
Explaining what the text 'proclaims' rather than proclaiming it.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed and intellectually challenged but may remain an observer of the 'event' of grace rather than a participant.

missende_elementen: Second-person address in the core theological moves
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The grace remains 'available' as a concept but is not 'delivered' as a personal act.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: The toezegging is present but often mediated through the description of Paul's writing.
voorbeelden: This is Paul’s invitation to us to join him in praising the Lord for including all kinds of ungodly people... even including you and me.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Limited. Mostly used in the final third to address newcomers or the congregation's self-image.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to dismantle pride: 'You and I... need a God'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Dominant. Used for Paul, God, Bush, Hussein, and 'the American way'.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a lecture-like atmosphere for the first 60% of the sermon.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Biblical history and recent political news.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological principles and general human behavior.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'now' of the congregation and the closing hymn.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from political analysis (Assertive) to 'we need to wrestle' (Directive).
voorbeelden: What is the American way of life? ... What is our ultimate allegiance? ... we need to wrestle with such questions.
foutief_patroon.probleem: Places the burden of 'wrestling' on the hearer before the grace of the text is performatively applied.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: The end of the sermon moves from the Indicative of God's mercy to the Declarative of 'no foreigners' to the Directive to 'stand in awe'.
voorbeelden: There are no foreigners among us... So do not be proud, but stand in awe.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Strong finish, but late in the delivery.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: In the company of the Lord’s disobedient children, there are no foreigners... So do not be proud.
voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: We need to wrestle with them... (before the indicative is established).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a high-level theological and social commentary. It 'talks about' the radical nature of the Gospel with great skill, but only occasionally 'performs' the Gospel as a direct address to the hearer's soul.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The justification of the ungodly knocks all the props out from under 'religion'.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Paul has been agonizing about the fact that so many of his own people have refused...
zwakke_punten.probleem: Historical reporting rather than present proclamation.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an 'event' in the final sections when the preacher addresses the 'foreigners' in the pews, but much of the text is a 'talk about' Paul and politics.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The sermon explains the 'means of grace' (justification) without fully acting as one until the very end.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is described as the actor in history, but the preacher speaks more as a commentator on God's ways than as God's mouth.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher acts as a 'teacher' or 'guide' through Paul's text.
tekstueel_bewijs: I am certainly not prepared at this time to make any conclusive judgments.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The preacher hopes the 'vision' will grip the hearer as it did Paul.
tekstueel_bewijs: Paul... seems to be seized by a kind of ecstatic vision.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon points toward the grace-filled nature of the community but stays largely in the realm of 'vision' rather than 'delivery'.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: The use of the hymn at the end provides an epiphanic moment.
tekstueel_bewijs: It will be water in the desert to those who confess their faults.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on 'is' and 'has' (Assertives). It needs more 'I declare' and 'He promises' (Declaratives/Commissives).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: This proclamation of the justification of the ungodly knocks all the props out from under 'religion'.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, this Word of God knocks the props out from under your religion and mine.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general truth to a present, illocutionary act of deconstruction.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is 'about' God's plan for the nations.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Directly apply the 'no foreigners' declaration to the specific anxieties of the congregation.
voorbeeldzinnen: Because Christ has died for the ungodly, I declare to you: you are no longer a foreigner to God's heart.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'You' to bring the hearer into the potter's hand.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the clay in His hands today.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The foundation is actually quite good at the end.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Ensure the 'wrestling' at the beginning is framed by the 'grace' that is to come.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is intellectually brilliant and theologically sound, but it functions more as a 'theological essay' than a 'sacramental event' for the first two-thirds. The performative power at the end saves it from being a mere lecture.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' about her uncertainty. SAT focuses on whether the preacher actually 'performs' the justification she describes.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric would praise the use of the 1990 news hook. SAT asks if that hook creates a 'constative surplus' that delays the illocutionary act of the Gospel.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that 'talking about' the justification of the ungodly is not the same as 'justifying the ungodly' through the spoken word.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: There are no foreigners among us; none at all.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: High - this is the sacramental 'event' of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Theological Description' that waits until the very end to become 'Proclamation'.
